item.the_forgotten_banana_of_rebirth.ban: Not your average banana. This one has been through a lot.
item.the_forgotten_banana_of_rebirth.dia: An opulent relic. Revives only those who died twice.
item.the_forgotten_banana_of_rebirth.har: Forged under pressure. Revives only those who died three times.
item.the_forgotten_banana_of_rebirth.net: Unbreakable resolve. Revives only those who died four times.
item.the_forgotten_banana_of_rebirth.dra: Ascended fruit. Revives anyone with five deaths or more.
